org.grouplens.lenskit.eval

Class EvalConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.EvalConfig

  • public class EvalConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that represents the set of properties passed in to a Groovy evaluation script. These properties will have been created by a caller, who passes in a Properties object, which will be embedded in the instance of this class. This instance will then be passed in to the Groovy evaluation script under a special name, so the script can use it to pull properties out.
    Since:
    1.1
